    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected float getBase(float xPx)
      Returns the base xPx-yValue to the corresponding xPx-touch yValue in pixels.
      protected int getClosestStackIndex(Range[] ranges, float yValue)
      Returns the index of the closest yValue inside the values array / ranges (stacked barchart) to the yValue given as a parameter.
      protected int getDataSetIndex(int xIndex, float xPx, float yPx)
      Returns the corresponding dataset-index for a given xIndex and xy-touch position in pixels.
      Highlight getHighlight(float xPx, float yPx)
      Returns a Highlight object corresponding to the given xPx- and yPx- touch positions in pixels.
      protected Range[] getRanges(BarEntry entry)
      Splits up the stack-values of the given bar-entry into Range objects.
      protected Highlight getStackedHighlight(Highlight old, IBarDataSet set, int xIndex, int dataSetIndex, double yValue)
      This method creates the Highlight object that also indicates which yValue of a stacked BarEntry has been selected.
      protected int getXIndex(float xPx)
      Returns the corresponding xPx-index for a given touch-position in pixels.
